post.body: Getting ready to watch the Ohio State Buckeyes! WooHoo! P.S. I figured out the @ thing (Yes, I'm a dummy).
Feeling like a complete idiot, cuz for the life of me, I can't figure out how y'all do those @Replies - is it a button or you just type @?
Getting ready to start back to work after the long holiday break. Did I mention I didn't sleep AT ALL last night? Not a wink! Shoot me now!
Watching "You've Got Mail", and being hungry but too lazy to make anything.
My friend Rhea is having an awesome giveaway.. http://tinyurl.com/7xsy66
Neighbors just moved cattle down the road. I ran out to get a picture, the cows turned around, now I'm hiding in case it was my fault. hehe
It's my last day of the holiday break. Tomorrow I'm back to working at least six days a week and college homework in my free time. *sigh*
I'm watching "The Notebook" and wondering why I put myself through this - It's SO much like my grandparents' story - I bawl every time! hehe
Feeling guilty for not being at work, cuz the ice storm hasn't started yet. Supposed to start around Noon-imagine I won't feel guilty then.
Relieved that I got a new job. Now I have FOUR jobs - I must be crazy!
Getting ready to post CCs.
going to bed. It has been a long day.
Camera-Critters posts are made! www.mistysmusings.com www.mistyswords.com
WoooHooo It's Saturday. Gotta go open up the CC linky and get my posts ready.
TGIF - that's all I've got to say :-D
I'm off to be MSG for eight hours and then let the weekend begin!!!
Another Wednesday down - two more weekdays to go. I'm dreaming of photo walks.
Just got home - I now have TWO babies!!! They're so cool!
I have a new baby! I just had a baby turkey hatch! Maybe I'm prejudiced, but it's cute. Of course I took pics!
Camera-Critters are posted! www.mistysmusings.com and www.mistyswords.com
